SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :4/DCLC where (DCLC_ADMNO, DCLC_CLNTNO) IN (select CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED, CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED from :4/cflc where CFLC_ADMNO=:1 and CFLC_CLNTNO=:2 and CFLC_USRID=':3')
